channel.title: Re: irc chat error
channel.description:
[quote="Moparisthebest, post:430, topic:283061"]I'm ironing out the bugs in the forum upgrade, then I'll be working on finishing up MoparScape 4.[/quote]
Can I bring one bug to your attention? (You're probably already aware of it) But when I click the "IRC CHAT" tab it takes me to irc but it always gives me a strange name, like the name of a random person on the forums. It's weird.

item.title: Re: irc chat error
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It should be all fixed now. A problem caused by smf’s fancy new caching system. Can anyone confirm?

Now it does not contain the nick field.
EDIT - NVM: You fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: irc chat error
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Try again.

Cool, it works fine now (:

Read full topic

item.title: Re: irc chat error
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It should be all fixed now. A problem caused by smf’s fancy new caching system. Can anyone confirm?

It doesn’t give me the name of a person on the forums, it gives me a name like I’m a guest. All good though.

Example:

moparirc_HbnQi

I remember before it joined irc with your forum username.

Read full topic

item.title: Re: irc chat error
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

MITB, I think that it sets your irc nick to the last person that logged in, cause my thing now says;

http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.com&channel=moparscape&nick=Davidi2

Read full topic

item.title: Re: irc chat error
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:326207”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=374052.msg3102444#msg3102444 date=1263803745]

I’m ironing out the bugs in the forum upgrade, then I’ll be working on finishing up MoparScape 4.

Can I bring one bug to your attention? (You’re probably already aware of it) But when I click the “IRC CHAT” tab it takes me to irc but it always gives me a strange name, like the name of a random person on the forums. It’s weird.

Is this after you are logged in? Because it works fine for me. Is there a ‘nick’ argument if you hover over it? Paste the link to me.
[/quote]
Yes, I was logged in, and it said:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.com&channel=moparscape&nick=Spades[/quote]

With the account you are on now?

Read full topic

[/quote]

Is this after you are logged in? Because it works fine for me. Is there a ‘nick’ argument if you hover over it? Paste the link to me.[/quote]
Yes, I was logged in, and it said:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/irc.php?img=0&host=irc.moparisthebest.com&channel=moparscape&nick=Spades

Is this after you are logged in? Because it works fine for me. Is there a ‘nick’ argument if you hover over it? Paste the link to me.
